default.title: Etiketler
default.message_2: A document can be tagged by multiple tags, and a tag can be applied to multiple documents.
default.message_3: Using the button, you can edit permissions on a tag.
default.message_4: If a tag can be read by another user or group, associated documents can also be read by those people.
default.message_5: For example, tag your company documents with a tag MyCompany and add the permission Can read to a group employees

security.enable_totp_message: Make sure you have a TOTP-compatible application on your phone ready to add a new account
security.title: İki aşamalı doğrulama
security.message_1:
Two-factor authentication allows you to add a layer of security on your {{ appName }} account.
Before activating this feature, make sure you have a TOTP-compatible app on your phone:
security.message_google_authenticator: For Android, iOS, and Blackberry: Google Authenticator
security.message_duo_mobile: For Android and iOS: Duo Mobile
security.message_2:
Those applications automatically generate a validation code that changes after a certain period of time.
You will be required to enter this validation code each time you login on {{ appName }}.
security.secret_key: Sizin için oluşturulan anahtar (secret key): {{ secret }}
security.secret_key_warning: Configure your TOTP app on your phone with this secret key now, you will not be able to access it later.
security.totp_enabled_message:
Two-factor authentication is enabled on your account.
Each time you login on {{ appName }}, you will be asked a validation code from your configured phone app.
If you lose your phone, you will not be able to login into your account but active sessions will allow you to regenerate a secrey key.

disable_totp.disable_totp: İki aşamalı doğrulamayı devre dışı bırak
disable_totp.message: Your account will not be protected by the two-factor authentication anymore.
disable_totp.submit: İki aşamalı doğrulamayı devre dışı bırak

security.test_totp: Lütfen telefonunuza gönderilen doğrulama kodunu yazın:
security.test_code_fail: This code is not valid, please double check that your phone is properly configured or disable Two-factor authentication

edit.delete_group_message: Bu grubu silmek istediğinize emin misiniz?
edit.edit_group_failed_message: This group name is already taken by another group
edit.group_used_message: This group is used in the workflow "{{ name }}"
edit.name: Ad

config.message_guest_access:
Guest access is a mode where anyone can access {{ appName }} without password.
Like a normal user, the guest user can only access its documents and those accessible through permissions.
config.disable_guest_access: Misafir kullanıcı erişimini devre dışı bırak
config.custom_css_placeholder: Ana biçim dosyasından sonra eklenecek olan özelleştirilmiş CSS
config.webhooks_explain: Webhooks will be called when the specified event occur. The given URL will be POST-ed with a JSON payload containing the event name and the ID of the concerned resource.

metadata.title: Custom metadata configuration
metadata.message: Here you can add custom metadata to your documents like an internal identifier or an expiration date. Please note that the metadata type cannot be changed after creation.
metadata.name: Üstveri adı

inbox.title: Inbox scanning
inbox.message:
By enabling this feature, the system will scan the specified inbox every minute for unread emails and automatically import them.
After importing an email, it will be marked as read.
Configuration settings for Gmail, Outlook.com, Yahoo.
inbox.last_sync: Last synchronization: {{ data.date | date: 'medium' }}, {{ data.count }} message{{ data.count > 1 ? 's' : '' }} içe aktarıldı
inbox.test_success: The connection to the inbox is successful ({{ count }} unread message{{ count > 1 ? 's' : '' }})
inbox.test_fail: An error occurred while connecting to the inbox, please check the parameters
inbox.autoTagsEnabled: Automatically add tags from subject line marked with #
inbox.deleteImported: Delete message from mailbox after import

monitoring.queued_tasks: There is currently {{ count }} queued tasks.
monitoring.queued_tasks_explain: File processing, thumbnail creation, index update, optical character recognition are background tasks. A large amount of unprocessed tasks will result in incomplete search results.
monitoring.indexing_info: If you notice discrepancies in the search results, you can try to do a full reindexing. Search results will be incomplete until this operation is done.
monitoring.reindexing_started: Re-indexing started, please wait until there is no more background tasks.

session.title: Açık olan oturumlar
session.clear_message: All other devices connected to this account will be disconnected

fileimporter.title: Çoklu dosya aktarıcısı
fileimporter.need_1: Import a directory of files at once
fileimporter.need_2: Scan a directory for new files and import them
fileimporter.line_1: Go to sismics/docs/releases and download the file importer tool for your system.
fileimporter.line_2: Follow the instructions here to use this tool.
fileimporter.line_3: Your files will be imported in documents according to the file importer configuration.

feedback.sent_message: Geri bildiriminiz için teşekkürler! Geri bildiriminiz sayesinde Teedy’i daha kullanışlı hale getireceğiz.

import.title: İçe aktarılıyor

import.error_general: An error occurred while trying to import your file, please make sure it is a valid EML file

403.title: Not authorized
403.message: The document you are trying to view is not shared anymore

validation.alphanumeric: Sadece harfler ve rakamlara izin verilir

step1.title: İlk seferiniz mi?
step1.description: If it's your first time on Teedy, click the Next button, otherwise feel free to close me.

step2.title: Dokümanlar
step2.description: Teedy is organized in documents and each document contains multiple files.

step3.title: Dosyalar
step3.description: You can add files after creating a document or before using this Quick upload area.

step4.title: Ara
step4.description: This is the main way to find your documents back. There is also an advanced search with the magnifier button.

step5.title: Etiketler
step5.description: Documents can be organized in tags (which are like super-folders). Buraya oluştur
